channel.title: [508] help i need somehelp with my new server
channel.description:
okay im gounna list a couple things that i need help with
1-how do i make myself owner 2-how do i make it downloadable 3-how can i drop/add items 4-what are some basic commands that works with 508
anwser as much as youcan plz and thanks

item.title: [508] help i need somehelp with my new server
item.dc:creator: @Deathspirit Deathspirit
item.description:
@Deathspirit wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:4, topic:310684”][quote author=Deathspirit link=topic=407112.msg3024146#msg3024146 date=1257793242]

To make yourself owner:
Step 1: Log off
Step 2: Go to the file “Characters”, there should be a wordpad of your acc
Step 3: Open it, then you will see “character rights”
Step 4: Swap the 0 for a 3
Step 5: Save and then log on

Some commands would be:
::mute
::ipmute
::ban
::ipban
[/quote]EPIC FAIL
It’s a 317

Read the subject…[/quote]I know but i mean his way to do it is a 317… Lol
Plus i ment to write “no” instead of “a”.

Read full topic
